Bash(git -C /Users/iheitlager/wc/auto-trader-worktree/agent-1 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 2: Data Pipeline

Add comprehensive data pipeline for market data collection, validation,
and universe management:

- Historical data downloader using yfinance with database persistence
- Data validator with OHLC validation, gap detection, and outlier detection
- Daily data updater for incremental updates with freshness tracking
- IB historical data alternative for Interactive Brokers users
- Universe screener with price/volume/volatility/market cap filters
- Momentum ranking system for stock selection
- Universe manager for persistence and lifecycle management

Includes unit tests \(31\) and integration tests \(10\) for the data module.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/iheitlager/wc/auto-trader-worktree/agent-1 commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 3: Strategy Development & Backtesting

Add comprehensive trading strategy framework and backtesting engine:

Strategies:
- Base strategy class with Signal/SignalType dataclasses
- Momentum strategy \(multi-timeframe returns, SMA, volume filters\)
- Mean reversion strategy \(Bollinger Bands, RSI, volume spikes\)
- Breakout strategy \(price channels, ATR, volume confirmation\)
- Confidence scoring for all signals

Backtesting:
- BacktestEngine with commission, slippage, position sizing
- Stop-loss and take-profit order simulation
- Performance metrics \(Sharpe, drawdown, win rate, profit factor\)
- Walk-forward validation for overfitting detection
- PerformanceAnalyzer with confidence intervals

Tests: 37 unit tests, 14 integration tests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /Users/iheitlager/wc/auto-trader-worktree/agent-1 commit --author="Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>" -m "Add Claude skills documentation for git commits")
